verses.verse: <S%H7121>"Call<s%> <S%H3426>now;<s%> is there any who will <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H6918>you?<s%> To which of the holy ones will you <S%H6437>turn?<s%>
For <S%H3708>resentment<s%> <S%H2026>kills<s%> the foolish <S%H191>man,<s%> and <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H4191>kills<s%> the <S%H6601>simple.<s%>
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H191>foolish<s%> taking <S%H8327>root,<s%> but <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> I <S%H5344>cursed<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
His <S%H1121>children<s%> are <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3468>safety.<s%> They are <S%H1792>crushed<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%> Neither is there any to deliver <S%H5337>them,<s%>

whose <S%H7105>harvest<s%> the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> eats <S%H398>up,<s%> and take it even <S%H413>out<s%> of the <S%H6791>thorns.<s%> The <S%H6782>snare<s%> <S%H7602>gapes<s%> for their <S%H2428>substance.<s%>
For <S%H205>affliction<s%> <S%H3318>doesn't<s%> come forth from the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> neither does <S%H5999>trouble<s%> spring <S%H6779>out<s%> of the <S%H127>ground;<s%>
but <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H5999>trouble,<s%> as the <S%H1121>sparks<s%> <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H1361>upward.<s%>
"But as for <S%H199>me,<s%> I would seek <S%H430>God.<s%> I would <S%H7760>commit<s%> my <S%H1700>cause<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%>
who <S%H6213>does<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%> that <S%H369>can't<s%> be fathomed, marvelous <S%H6381>things<s%> without <S%H4557>number;<s%>
who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7971>sends<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H2351>fields;<s%>
so that he sets <S%H7760>up<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%> those who are <S%H8217>low,<s%> those who <S%H6937>mourn<s%> are <S%H7682>exalted<s%> to <S%H3468>safety.<s%>
He <S%H6565>frustrates<s%> the <S%H4284>devices<s%> of the <S%H6175>crafty,<s%> So that their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H6213>can't<s%> perform their <S%H8454>enterprise.<s%>
He <S%H3920>takes<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> in their own <S%H6193>craftiness;<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H6617>cunning<s%> is carried <S%H4116>headlong.<s%>
They <S%H6298>meet<s%> with <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in the day <S%H3119>time,<s%> and <S%H4959>grope<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday<s%> as in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
But he <S%H3467>saves<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> even the <S%H34>needy<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2389>mighty.<s%>
So the <S%H1800>poor<s%> has <S%H8615>hope,<s%> and <S%H5766>injustice<s%> <S%H7092>shuts<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H835>"Behold,<s%> happy is the <S%H582>man<s%> whom <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H3198>corrects.<s%> Therefore do not <S%H3988>despise<s%> the <S%H4148>chastening<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
For he <S%H3510>wounds,<s%> and binds <S%H2280>up.<s%> He <S%H4272>injures,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> make <S%H7495>whole.<s%>
He will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6869>troubles;<s%> <S%H7651>yes,<s%> in seven no <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall touch <S%H5060>you.<s%>
In <S%H7458>famine<s%> he will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> you from <S%H4194>death;<s%> in <S%H4421>war,<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
You shall be <S%H2244>hidden<s%> from the <S%H7752>scourge<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> neither shall you be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7701>destruction<s%> when it <S%H935>comes.<s%>
At <S%H7701>destruction<s%> and <S%H3720>famine<s%> you shall <S%H7832>laugh,<s%> neither shall you be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
For you shall be <S%H1285>allied<s%> with the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%> The <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be at peace with <S%H7999>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H168>tent<s%> is in <S%H7965>peace.<s%> You shall <S%H6485>visit<s%> your <S%H5116>fold,<s%> and shall miss <S%H2398>nothing.<s%>
You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> also that your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H7227>great,<s%> Your <S%H6631>offspring<s%> as the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
You shall <S%H935>come<s%> to your <S%H6913>grave<s%> in a full <S%H3624>age,<s%> like a shock of <S%H1430>grain<s%> comes <S%H5927>in<s%> its <S%H6256>season.<s%>
Look <S%H2713>this,<s%> we have searched <S%H8085>it,<s%> so it is. Hear <S%H3045>it,<s%> and know it for your good."
